short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Powerful Salesforce development tools utilized for data backup, metadata download and deployment, and automated test, etc.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
#############################################
Salesforce Devsforce v62.8.23
#############################################
Support Tools for Salesforce Development with SFDX (Salesforce DX)
#1 Secure Account Management
      ・OAuth 2.0 authorization support for Salesforce accounts, without storing passwords.
      ・Secure username & password login. Username & password will be stored only in local storage.

#2 Metadata Management
      ・Instant retrieval of any Metadata type.
      ・Scheduled tasks for automatic Metadata retrieval.
      ・Comparison of Metadata between authorized Production or Sandbox environments.
      ・Deployment of Apex code, Custom Objects, Flows, and more(almost all of the Metadata).

#3 Data Management(SObjects, Tooling Objects)
      ・Data search functionality within authorized organizations.
      ・Export Salesforce Objects Data to CSV.
      ・Scheduled tasks for automated data fetching (Under development).

#4 Automated Apex Testing
      ・Immediate execution of specified/all Apex test classes in authorized environments.
      ・Scheduled fully-automatic recurring test tasks.

#############################################
Release Notes (Key updates marked with ★)
#############################################
v62.0.0 2024/10/15 ~ v62.8.23 2025/01/09
★New Logo.
★New feature: Enable auto-completion for SOQL in data management.
★New feature: Application settings available in data/metadata management.
★New feature: Enable display of picklist value definitions, filed dependencies and record types assignment in data management.
★New feature: Enable undo edits in data management.
★New feature: Enable removal of meta files from package in metadata management.
★New feature: Enable auto-completion and font size change in metadata editor
・API Version updated to 62.0.
・UI enhancements
・Bug fixes.

v61.0.0 2024/06/24 ~ v61.4.17 2024/09/25
★New feature: Enables refreshing and inserting, updating, deleting, undeleting data in DataForce module.
★New feature: Enables exporting extension settings, and importing them to other browser(e.g. Edge) and other computers.
・UI enhancements
・Fixed the bug that occurred when mass fetching the metadata of "Profile" in some large productions.
・Fixed the bug related to mass fetching the metadata of the "Layout" in some production environments, Due to higher security restrictions in production environments. this update may increase the time required to retrieve metadata, but it improves stability.
・API Version updated to 61.0.

v60.0.1 2024/03/14 ~ v60.0.2 2024/04/30
・Redirected login URL to Lightning to prevent inability to log in to the classic in sandbox.
・API Version updated to 60.0.

v59.0.0 2023/10/20 ~ v59.0.1 2023/11/22
・Privacy Policy URL updated.
・API Version updated to 59.0.

v56.0.0 2022/10/17 ~ v58.0.0 2023/06/12
・API Version updated.

v55.0.0 2022/07/10 ~ v55.6.12 2022/09/22
★Edit data in listview supported.
★Copy partial search results to clipboard supported.
★Download search results to CSV supported.
★API Version selection supported for automatic Metadata download.
・Bug fixes.
・API Version updated to 55.0.

v54.0.0 2022/03/05 ~ v54.2.6 2022/07/02
★Data management renewed.
★Mass export of attachments in ContentVersion & Attachment SObject supported.
・Various improvements.
・UI enhancements
・Bug fixes.
・API Version updated to 54.0.

v53.0.1 2022/01/27(Happy New Year!)
★UI improvements; Automatically generate a package.xml by clicking the "add" icon next to each metadata member(manual editing remains available).
★The "package.xml" button has been moved to the bottom right of the screen, facilitating mass metadata downloads.
・Bug fixes.

v53.0.0 2021/10/10
★Logo redesigned for friendliness.
★Chrome extension manifest upgraded to MV3 for latest Google support and enhancements in security, privacy, and performance.
★Privacy Policy updated with Chinese & Japanese language support.
★Redesigned UI of Process Monitoring.
・Bug fixes.
・API Version updated to 53.0.

v52.0.0 2021/07/31 ~ v52.0.3 2021/10/02
★UI improvement; mass retrieval of metadata with user-specific manifest files without switching user.
★Enhanced Full-Meta retrieval.
・Bug fixes.
・UI improvements.
・API Version updated to 52.0.

v51.1.3 2021/05/07
★Support added for metadata retrieval with customized manifest (package.xml) files.
・Bug fixes.

#############################################
Next time
#############################################
  Assistance with Salesforce data migration.
